name: Photos-smuggler
tagline: Extacting content and images from a (blocked) webpage and send it to your email.
body:
Photos Smuggler
===============

After google announcement about loading images from it's servers,I thought about a new way visiting blocked web pages.
so I wrote this script for fetching web pages and send it to a certain mail address.
by using this script you can have the content and (blocked) images of a web page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
